PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD in solution showed similar characteristics , covering a wide range absorption band of 300-900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD and PEBDTPD: These are most likely compound names or codes representing specific materials or substances. In this context, they can be considered as "Material" or "Compound" entities. However, since the focus is on their "Property Value" (absorption band), we can also consider them as "Property Value-Material" or "Property Value-Compound" entities.

2. 300-900 nm: This is a range of wavelengths in the electromagnetic spectrum. It can be considered as a "Property Value-Numeric" entity, specifically a "Range" type. Alternatively, it can be considered as a "Property Value-Wavelength" entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

POBDTPD and PEBDTPD (Property Value-Material or Property Value-Compound entities, representing specific materials or substances)

300-900 nm (Property Value-Numeric entity, specifically a "Range" type, representing the absorption band of the materials or substances)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| POBDTPD and PEBDTPD (covering a wide range absorption band) |
| 300-900 nm (absorption band: 300-900 nm) |
